mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_INFO( ORDER_CODE, ORDER_STATUS, USER_ID, ORDER_DATE ) VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{orderStatus}, #{userCode}, #{orderDate} )
INSERT INTO ORDERPRODUCT ( PRODUCT_CODE, ORDER_ID, ORDER_QUANTITY, ORDER_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{productCode}, #{orderCode}, #{orderQuantity}, #{orderPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT oi.ORDER_CODE, oi.ORDER_DATE, oi.ORDER_STATUS, oi.USER_ID, op.PRODUCT_CODE, op.ORDER_QUANTITY, op.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM order_info oi JOIN orderproduct op ON oi.ORDER_CODE = op.order_id

SELECT oi.ORDER_CODE, oi.ORDER_DATE, oi.ORDER_STATUS, oi.USER_ID, op.ORDER_QUANTITY, op.PRODUCT_CODE, op.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN ORDERPRODUCT op ON oi.ORDER_CODE = op.ORDER_ID WHERE oi.USER_ID = #{userCode}
